SEARCH
Package gw.api.desktop

Class DesktopQueuedActivitiesUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.desktop.DesktopQueuedActivitiesUtil
public class DesktopQueuedActivitiesUtil extends Object
Caches the current user's available queues in the servlet request scope, the selected queue in the CCWebSession, and provides various helper methods for the page to display and operate on the queues and their activities.
Author:
Mike Yang

  • Method Details

    • getAvailableQueues

      public static AvailableQueues getAvailableQueues()
      Returns the queues available for the current user in the servlet request scope.

    • getAvailableQueues

      public static AvailableQueues getAvailableQueues(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      This method is broken out so that it can be used in both Struts and Pebbles. It can be inlined after the CCPebblesConversion.

    • getSelectedQueue

      public static AssignableQueue getSelectedQueue()
      Returns the selected queue in CCWebSession.

    • setSelectedQueue

      public static void setSelectedQueue(AssignableQueue selectedQueue)
      Sets the selected queue. (Presumably, use with care)

    • getQueues

      public static AssignableQueue[] getQueues()
      Provides the list of actual queues for the pages's ToolbarRangeInput to select queues.

    • getLabel

      public static String getLabel(AssignableQueue queue)
      Provides the label for each queue in the page's ToolbarRangeInput.

    • isSelectedQueueEmpty

      public static boolean isSelectedQueueEmpty()
      If the selected queue is not contained in the list of AvailableQueues, then it should not contain any activities. Used to make the "Assign Next In Queue To Me" button available or not.

    • getActivitiesForSelectedQueue

      public static IQueryBeanResult getActivitiesForSelectedQueue()
      Provides the list of activities to display in the page's DesktopQueuedActivitiesLV.

    • assignNextQueuedActivityToMe

      public static void assignNextQueuedActivityToMe()
      Assigns the next activity in the selected queue to me.

    • assignActivitiesToMe

      public static void assignActivitiesToMe(ActivityDesktopView[] activityDesktopViews)
      Assigns activities in the selected queue to me.

    • refresh

      public static void refresh()
      Action called by the "Refresh" button; clears messages and calls refreshLocation.

    • clearErrors

      public static void clearErrors()
      Clears messages (normally error messages from a prior request - see CC-17967) from the page
